title: Compressed Air Compressor Types Comparison
description: Interactive animated cross-section diagrams comparing four common air compressor types: reciprocating, rotary screw, rotary vane, and centrifugal. Each compressor shows moving internal parts with labels, hover tooltips, and a specification summary card. Includes toggle for air flow visualization.
creator: Peter Vinck
subject: Compressed Air Systems

Industrial Equipment
prerequisites: Basic understanding of pressure and gas behavior
Familiarity with mechanical concepts (pistons, rotors, valves)
